CWEs: CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
description: The function 'unique_name_616' is vulnerable to code injection. The function does not sanitize the input 'p' before using it to access a property of the 'data' object. An attacker could potentially use this to inject malicious code. Although there is a check to prevent setting the 'root' property, other properties can still be manipulated.
